text:
The Thirukkurunkudi police have picked up a mentally deranged youth for allegedly strangulating to death his mother.

Police said Bhima (70) of Thirukkurunkudi was found dead in her house on Sunday. When the police interrogated the Peer Mohideen (40), mentally deranged son of the deceased about the murder, he gave conflicting replies, triggering suspicion that he might have murdered his mother.

Based on the post-mortem report, the interrogation would continue, a police officer here said.
title: Woman found dead
